item.title: SoundHound Breaks Critical Resistance: How High Can It Get Now?
item.description: SoundHound AI is on track to retest its all-time high but may not achieve it until late in the year, following the release of its Q3 earnings report.

item.title: Klarna IPO: BNPL Stock or Something Bigger?
item.description: Klarna’s IPO will test if investors see it as just another BNPL lender or a global shopping platform with AI and e-commerce ambition

item.title: Why Teradyne Is a Core Play in the AI Hardware Boom
item.description: Teradyne's crucial role in testing complex AI chips fuels a new growth phase, positioning the company as a key enabler of the entire hardware boom.
